title: Luxury Retreat
description: Experience an exquisite 16-bedroom mansion with 35 bathrooms, featuring a sumptuous blend of elegance and comfort, perfect for large gatherings and intimate getaways.
amenities: Includes a modern kitchen, luxurious home theater, gym, and extensive safety features. Family-friendly amenities available.
nearbyPlaces: Diverse dining, historic landmarks, and vibrant shopping nearby.
